overview: Jessica is young and confused. She doesn't understand the strange feelings she has for her older sister. It's more than a simple admiration, she feels an overwhelming love for her. With no one to talk to about her desires, Jessica is lost in a whirlwind of emotions. This is yet another high-brow hardcore production by Viv Thomas, packed with incredible extras!
tagline: When affection becomes desire… And love becomes an obsession…
title: Sisters
